name: The Croaker (itch)
description:
This is The Croaker where you dodge obstacles, jump onto platforms, and just have fun!

Still in development (Lot more major UI Fixing coming), a lot more stuff will get added, but it is the official 1.0 Release. 1.1 Should get released in about a month. If you think $1 Is Way too much for this game, you are not even CLOSE to what is about to come in future updates. You're going to love what's coming. Every update i'm adding in 5 NEW levels, as of 1.0, there is 13 levels. (There is a hidden one!!)
